item.title: Microsoft infuses enterprise agents with deep reasoning, unveils data Analyst agent that outsmarts competitors
item.description: Microsoft announced Tuesday two significant additions to its Copilot Studio platform: deep reasoning capabilities that enable agents to tackle complex...

item.title: Beyond transformers: Nvidia’s MambaVision aims to unlock faster, cheaper enterprise computer vision
item.description: Nvidia is updating its computer vision models with new versions of MambaVision that combine the best of Mamba and transformers to improve efficiency.

item.title: METASCALE improves LLM reasoning with adaptive strategies
item.description: METASCALE uses a three-stage approach to dynamically choose the right reasoning technique for each promblem.

item.title: Google releases ‘most intelligent model to date,’ Gemini 2.5 Pro
item.description: Gemini 2.5 Pro is now available for Gemini Advanced users and is Google's most capable model with a 1 million token context window.

item.title: ‘Insane’: OpenAI introduces GPT-4o native image generation and it’s already wowing users
item.description: As AI-generated images become more precise and accessible, GPT-4o represents a significant step forward in the space.
